column1: '''Chris Crawshaw''' was the seventh Chairman of [[The Tolkien Society]], serving for nearly 12 years Crawshaw is the Society's longest-serving Chairman. During her chairmanship, Crawshaw oversaw the large [[Tolkien 2005]] event and the expansion in the Society's membership following the release of ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column2: The Lord of the Rings]]'' films.
